message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I can come down a bit to $130. I believe that's a fair price reflecting the true value of the product.
I'm still not sure I can go up to $130. I'd be willing to pay $115 for the product.
